newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-CANADIAN HOOKER OUT IN THE COLD.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-CANADIAN HOOKER OUT IN THE COLD.

text.p: Canadian international hooker Karl Svoboda has been ousted from the Oxford team to face Cambridge University in the showpiece Varsity match at Twickenham next Tuesday.
Svoboda, 34, has played in the last three warm-up games but Oxford have preferred younger rival Nick Hockley against a Cambridge side containing three Australians and two New Zealanders.
Oxford will not use their No.12 jersey as a continuing mark of respect to their Australian centre Ian Tucker, who died a day after receiving a neck injury at Saracens in October.
